about_the_game:
Join the wildest party of the year! If crashing parties is your greatest passion, then this game is definitely for you. Step into the shoes of a young man who has no mercy for party people and become famous as the King of Party Crashing!


You’ll be sneaking into parties filled with strangers, where nobody will know or expect you. Don't draw any attention to yourself, blend in with the crowd of guests or sneak without getting noticed. Use your surroundings to hide and don’t make loud noises – the guests will hear you!


Choose one of the 20 available suburbs and pick a house where you'll be able to make the biggest number of pranks. Each residential area offers a different level of difficulty and brings other challenges. On a Friday evening many houses are buzzing with partygoers – explore the area and choose one where you can wreak the most havoc!


On each level you can complete several side tasks, for which you'll be able to train new skills. Choose the additional tasks that interest you from the task log and complete them!


Smear the kitchen knives with blood and leave them in the living room. Put rotten eggs behind the bedroom wardrobe. Pee into the pool. Throw cockroaches into the salad. Turn the partygoers’ life into a living hell!


Use the talent tree. Do you prefer to move noiselessly or run faster? Do you want to learn how to break locks or make smelly traps? The decision is yours!

content_descriptors.notes:
Substances - Game does contain images of Alcoholic beverages, Tobacco use, consumption of illegal drugs

Blood/Gore - Game does not use any depictions of blood or mutilation of body parts.

Violence - Game does not contain scenes involving aggresive conflict, bloodless dismembement and does not reference any of it.

Humor - Game does contain slapstick, suggestive humor, "adult" humor, sexual references and depiction or dialogue involving vulgar antics, including "bathroom" humor.

Language - Moderate use of profanity, swear words censored with " *** " (Example: Sh*t)

Nudity - Game contains brief depictions of nudity limited to characters wearing their underwear (ex. bikini)

Gambling - Game does not depict or simulate gambling, betting or wagering real cash or currency.

Sexuality - Non-explicit depictions of sexual behavior, possibly including partial nudity and references to sex and sexuality. Game does not use or reference strong sexual content or sexual violence.

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Intel HD 620

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent

  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 290X
